step.context: \textbf{Check Point } \#1: \text{ Is the function defined} \\ \text{and continuous in } [4, 5] ?
step.tex: \text{Yes. } e^x \text{ is defined and is continuous in } [4, 5]
\text{No. } e^x \text{ is not continuous at } x=4,5
step.reason: e^x \text{ is defined and is continuous } \forall \, x \in \mathbb{R} \\ \int^{b}_{a}f(x)\, dx \text{ makes sense only if f(x) is defined} \\ \text{and continuous in $[a, b]$. For e.g.}\int^{1}_{-1}\dfrac{1}{x}\, dx\\ \text{does not, because $\dfrac{1}{x}$ is discontinuous at $x = 0$.
